I relapsed by starting to use Kratom and then ventured into RC benzos as a way to get off Kratom, but of course that spiraled into abusing both and graduating to harder opiates as well as filling my adderall script. I stopped all benzo/adderall use and tapered down to Kratom.
I didn't sleep for a 4 day span in the past 2 weeks. I get so easily over-whelmed, and that feeling is really magnified when I stop dosing.
I'd usually take 2 and snort a half of one for a fast, hard come up and a pretty long high.

My usual for oxy is snorting 15 mg in 2 lines and then breaking up my other 2 15 mg's in a piece of paper towel and eating that. I get the best results if combine the high with some weed if I hit a bowl or two about an hour after taking the oxys.

Started with Narco 10s in highschool, worked my way up to pink oxys, then A 214s, then A 215s, and you know how it goes. Now I'm in college and I love the rush and buzz from railing a roxy and popping 2 more,

Eight days down, moving into day 9. Not as cool as r/The_Motel 's 112 but better than nothing.
Yesterday was okay minus a crazy afternoon episode of the sweats. I fuckin hate that feeling. Lingering symptoms are still morning GI/Restless when I try to relax/anxiety sweats.
Symptoms at 3 weeks out... broken sleep of 4-6 hours, morning shits (a very zen one this morning at least), anhedonia waves, come and go restless limbs.

Only things lingering around at 25 days are morning GI, restless sleep, anxiety/anhedonia waves.

I haven't WD'd in close to 2 years, I plan out my daily usage in a planner as to not use too much and raise my tolerance more than needed.
I'm going to get totally straight hamstered!
I don't WD often because I keep like 80 pounds of poppy seeds under my bed. But when I do WD, I WD badly because of my tolerance.
I knew as soon as I took them, the mental obsession would return... if I had them, they would be 100% gone. Which makes me feel like shit.

Im jonesin like a motherfucker. But it's been so long, that if I were to try to cop shit on the street I'd probably have a rough time. Looking too damn healthy after two years clean.

Starting all over now. Day 3. My withdrawals are never really that bad besides the sleep problem but I just take two extremely high doses of loperamide each 48 hours apart and before I know it i'm clear of the withdrawals

Today is day 13 for me! This is the longest I've been sober since summer 2011, and first time I'm really sober.
I haven't been sick in years, at least I haven't felt sick, other than withdrawals, in years.
I haven't done opiates in 10 months and I still fantasize about doing dope constantly.  And dream about scoring, or remembering a misplaced gram in my room every night.

I still go to class, get good grades, but I feel ***no*** enjoyment from any of my daily activities (except getting high). While I am currently keeping withdrawals at bay with 10 - 20mg a day of OC (I was pretty steady at 50 - 100mg a day, every day), I want to enjoy life again. does anyone else deal with this at such a young age?
I had my last oxy yesterday morning -- then I had about 1mg of sub last night, and I'm 100% dry

I have the devil in my ear saying just go grab a half G, you'll have a great day and you can say goodbye to it once and for all. I know it's bullshit and that's just gonna reopen that door into hell, but fuck me it's unreal how much I want to give into that lie.
I know it's a bad fucking idea and I've made it this far. I know I don't need to use.
Smoked a roach I had in my ash tray on Friday night and felt immense relief from the nasty cravings I was/am getting for my DOC.

Even now, on day 6 and just barely through the worst of the physical symptoms, my desire to use is still there. My desire to stay clean is also still there and this is why I'm posting about it and why I've been on the phone all morning.

verbatim_example: I'm an addict in early recovery (Feb. 22), I'm tripping balls.
I have been homeless have boosted and done various other things for a daily fix. Detox 7 times, impatient numerous times...etc etc.
I'm withdrawing and will be up aaall night. Would KILL for some benzos or something, but it is what it is.
I swear the withdrawals are just as bad if not worse than last time I detoxed even though I was doing significantly less, diff ROA and shorter time period.
Headed into day 4 now of withdrawal from bth. Far from my first rodeo but I'm at the breaking point.

Since I'm staying with my mom while detoxing, before she went to work she sat down with me and said, "you're not going to use, I know you won't. You've come too far. What can we do to get you through the next couple of days?"
I was basically sitting on my hands watching the clock minute by minute telling myself not to leave the house. I knew if I left I'd get dope.
Has anyone else have any knowledge or experience with this? **ANY** help is extremely appreciated.

These 6 months of recovery have been fucking amazing!! I started at the very bottom at a sales job, and have worked my way close to the top. Just got promoted to sales manager last week! I'm making great money, and will be in the market for my own little condo by summer.
